content:
In Chinese Nanke, according to the results of the quarterfinal matches of the World Cup from the command women's sword, the Ukrainian national team has received a license for the 2024 Olympic Games.

About thisinformsThe Central Sports Club of the Armed Forces.

"We have an Olympic license in the team spray for the 2024 Olympic Games," the message reads.

The composition of the national team of Ukraine for fencing on swords:

  • Elena Kryvytska,
  • Joan Fabie Bezhura,
  • Vlada Kharkov,
  • Inna Brovko.

As reportedArmyinform, Army Maria Sakharuk won a license for Olympic walking.
title: Army skewers won the 2024 Olympic Games License
